ENV.INSTANCE_NR:
INSTANCE_NR Your application will be deployed in multiple instances.
Every instance will have a different INSTANCE_NR.
To avoid any conflicts init any data (for example: database schema) only if INSTANCE_NR is equal to "0".0

NOTE.READY: Your application must write READY to the standard output after your server is ready to receive HTTP requests. Timeout is 3s.
NOTE.MULTI_INSTANCE: Your application must be stateless. Any data must be stored in a database.
